          <title>
            <string language="en">Separation of salt from salt solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trennung des Salzes von der Salzlösung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Séparation de sel de solution de sel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Separação do sal da solução de sal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Separazione di sale dalla soluzione salina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χωρισμός του άλατος από την αλατισμένη λύση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Separación de la sal de la solución de sal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how salt is separated from a salt solution through evaporation.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="en">separation</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Salz von einer 
Salzlösung durch Verdampfung getrennt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment du sel est 
séparé d'une solution de sel par l'évaporation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o sal é separado de
uma solução de sal com a evaporação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come il sale è 
separato da una soluzione salina con evaporazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς το άλας είναι 
χωρισμένο από μια αλατισμένη λύση μέσω της εξάτμισης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la sal se separa 
de una solución de sal con la evaporación.</string>
          </description>
